phrs.translation: 未爆炸军火；未爆炸武器

sentences.sentence: This was a second piece of ordnance.
"That much ordnance going off would be the equivalent of an earthquake" Cartwright told me.
sentences.translation: “那么多军火爆炸的效果可能就等量于一次地震了。”Cart wright告诉我。

sentences.sentence: During the summer of 2007 an average of 22 tonnes of ordnance was dropped on Helmand every month.
sentences.translation: 在2007年夏天，平均每个月有22吨的炮火砸在赫尔曼德。
